scripts.setup: yarn install --immutable && yarn get-secrets rpx-aat && yarn pwinstall && yarn playwright install webkit && yarn playwright install firefox
scripts.lint: yarn lint:prettier && yarn lint:src && yarn lint:api
scripts.lint:ng: echo 'No Angular workspace in rpx-xui-e2e-tests; skipping ng lint.'
scripts.test:api:pw: rm -rf functional-output/tests/playwright-api/odhin-report functional-output/tests/api_functional/odhin-report reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright && PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTERS=list,odhin,junit PLAYWRIGHT_REPORT_FOLDER=functional-output/tests/playwright-api/odhin-report sh -c 'npx playwright test --project=api "$@"; status=$?; node ./scripts/copy-odhin-report.cjs; exit $status' --
scripts.test:api:pw:coverage: rm -rf functional-output/tests/playwright-api/odhin-report functional-output/tests/api_functional/odhin-report reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright && PW_ODHIN_LINK_COVERAGE=true PLAYWRIGHT_REPORTERS=list,odhin,junit PLAYWRIGHT_REPORT_FOLDER=functional-output/tests/playwright-api/odhin-report PLAYWRIGHT_REPORT_PROJECT="rpx-xui-e2e-tests (API coverage tests)" PW_ODHIN_TITLE="rpx-xui-e2e Playwright API coverage tests" PW_ODHIN_COVERAGE_ROOT=reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright COVERAGE_SUMMARY_PATH=reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright/coverage-summary.json COVERAGE_TEXT_PATH=reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright/coverage-summary.txt COVERAGE_ROWS_PATH=reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright/coverage-summary-rows.json sh -c 'c8 --reporter=lcov --reporter=json-summary --reporter=text --reporter=text-summary --reporter=html --report-dir ./reports/tests/coverage/api-playwright npx playwright test --project=api "$@"; status=$?; node ./scripts/reportCoverage.cjs; node ./scripts/copy-odhin-report.cjs; exit $status' --
